title: Defunding mRNA Vaccine Research - BARDA Terminates 22 Contracts
summary: BARDA (Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority) terminated 22 contracts with university researchers and private companies developing new uses for mRNA technology. Secretary Kennedy claimed shift toward 'whole killed virus' vaccines instead. Public health experts express dismay, noting mRNA technology proved critical for rapid COVID-19 vaccine development and has potential for cancer treatments, flu vaccines, and other medical breakthroughs.
